s0101: Extinguished Kui, Kui not sacrificed Zhu Rong, Yu Xiong reason.
s0102: Xia, attacked Song, Song reported urgent to Jin, Jin saved Song, Cheng Wang stopped returned.
s0103: General Zi Yu requested battle, Cheng Wang said: 'Chong Er fled dwelt outside long, finally got return state, heaven opened, cannot oppose.'
s0104: Zi Yu firmly requested, then gave him few teachers left.
s0105: Jin indeed defeated Zi Yu at Cheng Pu.
s0106: Cheng Wang angered, executed Zi Yu.
s0107: Forty six years, initially, Cheng Wang about with Shang Chen as crown prince, spoke commanded Ling Yin Zi Shang.
s0108: Zi Shang said: 'Lord teeth not old, yet many inner favorites, expel then chaos.
s0109: Chu state raising often at young ones.
s0110: Moreover Shang Chen wasp eyes wolf voice, ruthless person, cannot establish.'
s0112: Later again wished establish Zi Zhi expel crown prince Shang Chen.
s0113: Shang Chen heard yet not confirmed, told his tutor Pan Chong: 'How get real?'
s0114: Chong said: 'Feast wang favored concubine Jiang Mi yet not respect.'
s0116: Jiang Mi angered said: 'Suitable wang wish kill you establish Zhi.'
s0117: Shang Chen told Pan Chong said: 'Trust.'
s0124: Winter ten month, Shang Chen with palace guard troops surrounded Cheng Wang.
s0125: Cheng Wang requested eat bear paw die, not listened.
s0126: Ding Wei, Cheng Wang self strangled killed.
s0127: Shang Chen replaced established, this was Mu Wang.
s0128: Mu Wang established, with his crown prince palace gave Pan Chong, made grand master, grasped state matters.
s0129: Mu Wang three years, extinguished Jiang.
s0135: Zhuang Wang established three years, not issued commands, day night for music, commanded state middle: 'Have dare admonish die no pardon!'
s0137: Zhuang Wang left embraced Zheng Ji, right embraced Yue woman, sat bell drum between.
s0138: Wu Ju said: 'Wish have advance hidden.'
s0139: Said: 'Have bird at mound, three years not fly not cry, what bird?'
s0140: Zhuang Wang said: 'Three years not fly, fly will rush heaven;
s0141: Three years not cry, cry will alarm people.
s0143: Dwelt several months, dissipated increasingly severe.
s0144: Grand master Su Cong then entered admonished.
s0146: Replied: 'Kill body clarify lord, minister wish.'
s0147: Then stopped dissipated music, listened politics, executed hundreds people, promoted hundreds people, employed Wu Ju, Su Cong with politics, state people greatly delighted.
s0149: Six years, attacked Song, captured five hundred chariots.
s0150: Eight years, attacked Lu Hun Rong, then reached Luo, reviewed troops at Zhou suburbs.
